property.value: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.

property.value: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Diseased Vermin deals combat damage to a player, put an infection counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, Diseased Vermin deals X damage to target opponent previously dealt damage by it, where X is the number of infection counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a green or white permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

property.value: "No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior."—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

property.name: Flavor

Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage to defending player this turn and that player loses 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.

property.value:
Return all Islands to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let Balduvia burn to warm Kjeldor's hearth"—General Varchild

property.value: Ć: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. 1ą: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.value: Ć: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. 1ą: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Phantasmal Sphere, then sacrifice Phantasmal Sphere unless you pay 1 for each +1/+1 counter on it. When Phantasmal Sphere leaves the battlefield, put a blue Orb creature token with flying onto the battlefield under target opponent's control. That creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Phantasmal Sphere.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ĉ: Phelddagrif gains trample until end of turn. Target opponent puts a 1/1 green Hippo creature token onto the battlefield. Ą: Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life. ą: Return Phelddagrif to its owner's hand. Target opponent may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts."—Gerda Äagesdotter,Archmage of the Unseen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dagsson should have paid attention to the lessons of Phyrexia before attempting to create a mechanical utopia."—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it. Exile the top card of your library: Put X +1/+1 counters on Phyrexian Devourer, where X is the exiled card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3: If your library has ten or more cards in it, target opponent looks at the top ten cards of your library and separates them into two face-down piles. Exile one of those piles. Search the other pile for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle the rest of that pile into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Deal with the spawn of Phyrexia cautiously; only with time may we control them."—Arcum Dagsson,Soldevi Machinist

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowing its origins, how could they have thought they could control it?"—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment."—Lovisa Coldeyes,Balduvian Chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Primitive Justice, you may pay 1ć and/or 1Ĉ any number of times. Destroy target artifact. For each additional 1ć you paid, destroy another target artifact. For each additional 1Ĉ you paid, destroy another target artifact, and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anybody want some . . . toast?"—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them send their legions I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords."—General Varchild

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We aided the Balduvians once before. They need but ask and we shall do so again."—King Darien of Kjeldor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families."—King Darien of Kjeldor

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Ritual of the Machine, sacrifice a creature. Gain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rumors persist of dark deeds performed in the depths of Soldev. When will Dagsson heed the danger therein?"—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wage counter on Rogue Skycaptain. You may pay 2 for each wage counter on it. If you don't, remove all wage counters from Rogue Skycaptain and an opponent gains control of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep Ą (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever a Swamp, Mountain, black permanent, or red permanent becomes tapped, Royal Decree deals 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not so easy anymore. Nothing grows in Kjeldor but seaweed."—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor."—King Darien of Kjeldor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ, Sacrifice Scarab of the Unseen: Return all Auras attached to target permanent you own to their owners' hands. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.value: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay Scars of the Veteran's mana cost. Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool.

property.value: After the terrible retribution visited upon Lat-Nam, this school of mages chose to hide from the eyes of the world.

property.value: If Sheltered Valley would enter the battlefield, instead sacrifice each other permanent named Sheltered Valley you control, then put Sheltered Valley onto the battlefield. property.value: 1: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
